events.message: I ordered a jacket last week but it doesn't fit me at all. I would like to request a refund since I want to return it.
The case has been categorized under Refund based on the customer's request for money back due to a return.
A customer support agent has been assigned to handle the refund request for the returned jacket.
Hello! Thank you for reaching out. Iâ€™m here to help you process your refund for the jacket you purchased.
Could you please provide your order number and confirm if the jacket is still in its original packaging for the return?
Sure, my order number is 569823. The jacket is unused and still in the original packaging as received.
Thank you for the information. We will send you a prepaid return shipping label shortly. Once we receive the jacket, we will initiate the refund.
That sounds great, thank you for your quick help and clear instructions on returning the item.
We have received the returned jacket and processed your refund. The amount should appear in your account within 3-5 business days.
Just checking in to confirm you received the refund for your jacket return. Please let us know if you have any further questions.
We are closing this case now. Feel free to contact us anytime if you need further assistance with your orders.
